description: This file contains utilities for generating PowerPoint presentations (PPTX) using the pptxgenjs library. It provides functions to create PPTX files from slide data or structured outlines, manage file downloads, and embed images and text within slides.

methods.name: downloadBlob(blob, fileName)
methods.description: Creates a temporary object URL from a Blob and programmatically triggers its download via an anchor element, with URL revocation to prevent memory leaks.

methods.name: generatePptx(slides, fileNameTitle = 'Presentation')
methods.description: Creates a PowerPoint presentation with one slide per item in the slides array, including a title slide, and attempts to save it using built-in save or falls back to blob download.

methods.name: generatePptxFromOutline(outline, imagesByPage, fileNameTitle = 'Presentation')
methods.description: Generates a PPTX file from a structured outline object, adding slides with titles, bullet points, optional images, and notes, then saves or downloads the presentation.

methods.name: sanitize(name)
methods.description: Sanitizes a string to create a safe filename by replacing non-word characters with underscores.
